content:
AH, ok, you were pulling in the key from the right location. There are 2 files in there. 
id_ed25519.pub and id_ed25519. 

.pub is just a file with the key starting with: ssh-ed25519
the one without an ext is in the format you specified. 

Pulling from there as you did initially obviously makes more sense. Sorry for the confusion I caused.
